dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 1371 IH: Vet Connect Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. O'Rourke introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to authorize the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to disclose to non-Department of Veterans Affairs health care providers certain medical records of veterans who receive health care from such providers.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Vet Connect Act of 2017.

section.header: Authority to disclose certain medical records of veterans who receive non-Department of Veterans Affairs health care
section.text: Section 7332(b)(2) of title 38, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following new subparagraph:

clause.text: To a non-Department entity (including private entities and other departments or agencies of the Federal Government) that provides hospital care or medical treatment to veterans.
An entity to which a record is disclosed under this subparagraph may not redisclose or use such record for a purpose other than that for which the disclosure was made.
